title: baned account
body: my acc is baned  was 14 days ban but 2-3 days im playng not was flame or negattive atitude but anyway baned whats hellpen idk...  hellp me please

replies.body: While it does look like you were trying to give your team some tips, some of the things that were said could have been seen pretty negatively. I don't want to give out your personal info (such as chat logs) here on the boards, but reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to go over what was said and why the ban was placed.
